block.p: EPSTEIN-Gerald. 73. Of Red Bank, NJ, formerly of Great Neck, LI. Beloved husband of Charlotte Fishkind Leigh Epstein. Father of Julie Evans and Pamela Staeudle. Brother of Irma Stecher. Grandfather of Max and Tracy Staeudle and Chloe Evans. Funeral services will be held today at 11 AM at Temple Shalom, 5 Ayrmont Lane, Aberdeen, NJ. Interment Wellwood Cemetery, Pinelawn, LI, NY. Donations to the Leukemia Society would be appreciated.
